name: Witch Portals?
description:
A non-euclidean game that takes place inside a witch's house!

Navigate through a:

✧ Potion Escape Room

Use what's around in the room to find a way out!

✧ Multi-Door Hallway

Get to the end of the hallway, but things aren't as they seem!
Dodge furniture, hands, and bats while trying to find the true exit.
Try not to lose that potion!

✧ Witch's Kitchen

Make an escape from this enchanted kitchen!
Perhaps some trickery is at hand...

Programmers
Calex Raffield
Dylan Higashionna
Randy Le
Sheel Kulkarni
